text:
We’re looking for a Co-Founder & CTO

Abtik Group of Companies is searching for a passionate technologist who can lead our product development and tech vision.

👉 This is an equity-based role (no fixed salary at this stage).
If you’re ready to build, innovate, and grow with us — let’s connect!

📩 Drop your profile at

🚀 Help a doctor navigate the complexities of setting up and operating cross-border healthcare businesses by building the brand together! If you’re an expert in marketing for healthtech companies and have experience building and scaling brands, I’d love to connect with you. Please apply or DM if interested.
Requesting all my awesome contacts to share and help me kick things off on the right foot! 🙏
